ping_help: Basic ping t' observe if th' bot be still sailin'.
quote_not_found: I was unable t' find thar scribblin' anywhere, be it somewhere I can't observe?
quote_nsfw_refused: Ye requested a scribblin' from an NSFW cabin but 'tis cabin be not marked as NSFW, quote denied.
censored_invite:
Censored scribblin' by {user}, invite code `{code}` t' `{server_name}` be not allowed.
```{message}```
custom_command_no_commands: No custom commands have been built yet.
custom_command_empty_trigger: Empty triggers, that be like empty promises aye? Something ye should nah be doin'?
custom_command_empty_reply: Ye want me t' say nothin' fer that trigger? That be makin' no sense, if ye want t' scrap an existing trigger use remove instead.
custom_command_override_confirmation: 'Tis command already be existin', do ye want t' replace it wit' 'tis new text?
custom_command_not_found: Unable t' scrap `{trigger}` as it does nah seem t' exist.
custom_command_creating: 'Tis command be nah existin', buildin' it fer ye instead.
custom_commands_help: List all custom commands fer 'tis ship, also th' base command t' buildin', updatin' 'n removin' them.
assignable_roles_help: Lists self assignable ranks or adds/removes 'rank' from you.
role_not_allowed: Ye be nah allowed t' add 'tis rank t' yerself.
unknown_user: Unable t' find any Discord sailor by that name or ID.
help_not_found: I can nah seem t' find any cog or command named {query}.
help_no_wall_allowed: Sorry, can't help ye wit' that wall o' text.
help_help: Lists all commands, th' commands from a cog or info 'bout a command.
warn_help: Adds a new warnin', th' sailor be not informed o' 'tis.
warning_to_long: Warning be too long, I can only store warnin's up to 1800 characters.
warning_not_allowed: Ye nah be allowed t' warn {user}.
inf_search_help: Shows all infractions given by or t' a given sailor.
inf_not_found: Unable t' find an infraction wit' id {id} on 'tis ship.
cf_fetch_failed: Data retrieval failed, seems like th' API be havin' issues, please try again later.
cf_not_found: Unable t' fetch info fer that project, be ye sure it be existin'?
